annotations.description: The fans in the stadium certainly won't regret buying tickets as they witnessed a great game today. The home side dominated today's game. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession, while the away side made defence their highest priority.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) is cleared. Good work from Real Madrid as they win a corner.

Wow, what an escape. Lucas (Real Madrid) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked. Real Madrid have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 2 min. of added time.
Carles Planas (Celta Vigo) clearly holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee immediately stops play.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Nolito (Celta Vigo) times his run too early and the linesman raises his flag for offside.

Nolito (Celta Vigo) attempts to find one of his teammates with a sweet pass into the box, but one of the defending players reacts well and intercepts the effort.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) demonstrates how to play football! He collects the ball and decides to go alone. He weaves through the defence and gets to the edge of the box from where he finishes with a low effort into the bottom right corner, deflecting in off the post.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: We can have a look at the statistics now, shots on target are 12:3.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: An amazing individual effort from Jese (Real Madrid) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the bottom left corner and makes it 6:1. Ruben Blanco was helpless.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It is time for a substitution. Marcelo (Real Madrid) is on for Daniel Carvajal.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That's the end of the game for Daniel Wass, who is replaced by Claudio Beauvue (Celta Vigo).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) jumped highest to meet a perfectly executed corner kick by Jese. His header was precise and ended up in the back of the net, leaving the goalkeeper flapping in the wind. The score is 3:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jese (Real Madrid) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

Carles Planas (Celta Vigo) did his best to latch onto a through ball, but it was too strong.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniel Wass (Celta Vigo) takes the corner which is cleared by the opposition's defence.

John Guidetti (Celta Vigo) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players. Celta Vigo have a corner.
Celta Vigo keep possession of the ball by producing short passes and one two passes from player to player.

annotations.description: Borja Mayoral Moya comes off the pitch to be replaced by Jese (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) will replace Isco.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Isco passes the ball to the feet of Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), who has an empty net in front of him and has no problems in tapping the ball in. 4:1.
Real Madrid are showcasing great team work by exchanging some short passes and one two passes, waiting to open the opposition's defence and hit them swiftly on the break.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL 3:1! Sergio Gomez Sola found Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) inside the box, he spotted goalkeeper Keylor Navas off his line and chipped the ball into the net. What a cheeky lob!
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) takes the set piece from outside the box. His shot heads towards the top left corner, but Ruben Blanco dives and saves the effort, punching it onto the post.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Jonny (Celta Vigo) got a yellow card.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) scores from a free kick after smashing the ball over the defensive wall and into the top left corner of the goal!

Isco (Real Madrid) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is able to continue to play.

Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Jesus Gil Manzano has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 68467.
Danilo (Real Madrid) is forced to stop his attacking move after the linesman signals for offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: The defending players give Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) far too much free space and he knows how to take advantage of it. He produces a howitzer which goes into the top of the net. Ruben Blanco was taken unawares by his effort and the score is 1:0.
Lucas (Real Madrid) dribbles into space and finds himself in a shooting position, but his shot from the edge of the box is bravely blocked.
Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Keylor Navas, who smothers the ball.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Referee Jesus Gil Manzano blows his whistle to start the second half.

Up to now the game has been rather average in terms of entertainment, with little in the way of thrilling moments. The home side is in control of this game. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle

Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) wasted a huge opportunity! The fans already began to celebrate as he produced a shot from the edge of the box after a brilliant solo effort. The ball went towards the left side of the goal, but Ruben Blanco made an astonishing save!

Iago Aspas (Celta Vigo) gets to a rebound in front of goal and sends the ball towards the bottom right corner. However, he couldn't beat Keylor Navas, who shows off his superb goalkeeping ability by pulling off a great save.
